testsuite.name: Test

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #4
The program could not handle a invalid assignment.

---
> var1 = 1 Invalid identifier > кириллица = 123 Invalid identifier > var = 2a Invalid assignment > c = 7 - 1 = 5
